original_title: JFK Assassination Files: The Case For Conspiracy
overview: For the first time, the complete filmed record of the "Crime of the Century" - the assassination of John F. Kennedy, 35th President of the United States, on November 22, 1963 - an event that shocked the world. Featuring the famous Zapruder film and other rare and exclusive assassination films.
title: JFK Assassination Files: The Case For Conspiracy
